3: They must have spotted you somewhere along the way. That's why they're chasing you...
Before you know it, you find yourself near the ruins of a farm.
You wonder why it's awfully quiet here...
Lee picks up a tattered piece of fabric from the ground. It looks like it came from a part of a backpack.
It's the logo of the... expedition the mayor spoke of.
The Corrupted drove us here on purpose.
There's the sound of mechanical feet rustling grass from somewhere nearby.
You suddenly understand why the expedition went missing.
